comments_since_last_sample.body: RE7 Biohazard, RE Village and Visage.  Infliction is pretty low budget but will scare the shit out of you at times too.
I had an absolute blast playing the Resident evil series from start when Village was announced. But 7 & Village are the stuff if you want quality horror and they are pretty much a standalone story.
It's a bit older, but Amnesia, the dark descent is pretty great, and made me pee myself a few times. It even has sequels but I haven't gotten around to them yet.

I’d check out The Dark Pictures Anthology series.

Man of Medan was pretty good, as was Little Hope. If you’re into decision based gaming. There’s a new one out now too.

Until Dawn is excellent too. And Outlast. Although these have been out several years.
